title: Fix certificate display in MediaGallery

requirements.text: Debug the MediaGallery component's certificate tab to identify why certificates are not rendering despite photos working correctly after the previous fix
acceptanceCriteria: Console logging shows certificate data being fetched from backend
Certificate blob URLs are successfully generated
Root cause of certificate display issue is identified

requirements.text: Verify that the useCertificates and useCertificate hooks properly handle the blob data format and convert it to displayable URLs using the same pattern that works for photos
acceptanceCriteria: useCertificates hook returns valid blob URLs for all certificates
useCertificate hook returns valid blob URL for individual certificate
Blob URL generation follows the same working pattern as photo hooks

requirements.text: Fix the MediaGallery component to properly render the certificates tab, ensuring that uploaded certificates display in the gallery grid with the same visual treatment as photos
acceptanceCriteria: Certificates tab shows uploaded certificate images in a grid
Each certificate card displays the image with title and upload date
Clicking a certificate opens it in the modal viewer
Upload new certificate button works correctly

requirements.text: Verify the backend getAllCertificates and getCertificate methods return data in the exact same format as getAllPhotos and getPhoto to ensure consistency in the data pipeline
acceptanceCriteria: getAllCertificates returns array of CertificateData with proper blob references
getCertificate returns single CertificateData with proper blob reference
Return format matches the working photo methods exactly

constraints: Do not modify the working photo display functionality
Maintain the existing MediaGallery tabbed interface structure
Preserve the upload functionality that successfully stores certificates in the backend
nonGoals: Changing the MediaGallery UI design or layout
Adding new features beyond fixing certificate display
Modifying the backend storage schema or data types
